text: The Air Forces of the National People's Army () was the air force of East Germany. It was a part of the National People's Army, established in 1956. == Structure == === 1. Luftverteidigungsdivision (1. LVD) === * Jagdfliegergeschwader 1 "Fritz Schmenke" (HQ Holzdorf) * Jagdfliegergeschwader 3 "Wladimir Komarow" (HQ Preschen) * Jagdfliegergeschwader 7 "Wilhelm Pieck" (HQ Drewitz) * Jagdfliegergeschwader 8 "Hermann Matern" (HQ Marxwald) * 41. Fla-Raketenbrigade "Hermann Dunker" (HQ Ladeberg) * 51. Fla-Raketenbrigade "Werner Lamberz" (HQ Sprötau) * Fla-Raketenregiment 31 "Jaroslaw Dombrowski" (HQ Straßgräbchen) === 3. Luftverteidigungsdivision (3. LVD) === * Jagdfliegergeschwader 2 "Juri Gagarin" (HQ Trollenhagen) * Jagdfliegergeschwader 9 "Heinrich Rau" (HQ Peenemünde) * 43. Fla- Raketenbrigade "Erich Weinert" (HQ Sanitz) * Fla-Raketenregiment 13 "Etkar André" (HQ Parchim) * Fla-Raketenregiment 23 "Rudolf Breitscheid" (HQ Stallberg) == Equipment == === Fighter Aircraft === *Mikoyan MiG-21 *Mikoyan MiG-29 *Mikoyan MiG-23 *Mikoyan MiG-23BN *Sukhoi Su-22 *Aero L-39 Albatros === Transport Aircraft === *Antonov An-2 *Antonov An-26 *Ilyushin Il-62 *Tupolev Tu-134 *Tupolev Tu-154 *Let L-410 Turbolet *Zlín Z 43 === Helicopters === *Mil Mi-2 *Mil Mi-8 *Mil Mi-24 *Mil Mi-14 === Surface-to-Air Missiles === *S-75 Dvina (SA-2 Guideline) *S-75 Wolchow (SA-2 Guideline) *S-125 Newa (SA-3 Goa) *S-200 Wega (SA-5 Gammon) *S-300 (SA-10 Grumble) National People's Army Category:German military organizations
title: Air Forces of the National People's Army
